feed.title: Dittofeed Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.17.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • upgrade tags to v0.16.0 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1029
  • separate user pages by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1030
  • APP_VERSION env var by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1031
  • fix admin-cli appVersion by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1032
  • expose subscription group controller via admin by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1034
  • add subscription group admin controller api json by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1037
  • retrieved attribute by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1036
  • test when a segment is defined post relevant event by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1035
  • enable name sorting in resource table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1038
  • improve visibility for process assignments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1039
  • revert process ordering change by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1040
  • more process assignments span tags by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1041
  • computed property version tag by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1042
  • remove upper bound on process assignments step by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1043
  • move pagination in process assignments statement by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1044
  • external id bootstrap postgres by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1046
  • fix reversed ordering on parent child workspace auth by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1047

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • add seo-friendly titles and logo link by @chandlercraig in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1050
  • improve error handling for delivering parsing by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1051
  • admin cli helm chart by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1052
  • add k8s to upgrade v0.17.0 docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1053
  • have waiting room refreshes go to login by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1054
  • unsubscribe url tag by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1055
  • first draft of low code email editor package by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1057
  • remove join from processed query by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1058
  • temporarily remove emailo from dashboard deps until dockerfile fixed by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1059
  • temporarily remove emailo styles by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1060
  • fix emailo in dockerfiles by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1061
  • Open the Node Editor when user drops a new node into the journey by @lyamone in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1056
  • fix app_version env variable in dockerfiles by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1062
  • remove fields nested process assignments query by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1063
  • revert proccessed query changes, and supply new join algorithm by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1064
  • ensure admin api endpoints access query string by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1065
  • use cursor based pagination for processing assignments by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1066
  • disable indexing of the dashboard by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1067
  • endpoint for looking up subscriptions for user by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1048
  • get or create write key on bootstrap by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1045
  • abstract deliveries code by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1068
  • allow custom navcard for whitelabeled by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1069
  • add blob storage volume to lite dockerfile by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1070
  • resource create buttons by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1071
  • lowcode template editor integration by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1072
  • show journey status in table by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1073
  • add emailo dep to worker by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1074
  • journey settings for copying config by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1075
  • fix dockerfiles by adding emailo by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1076
  • add emailo to admin-cli by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1077
  • build emailo in api and worker by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1078
  • rearrange order of emailo build by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1079
  • fix typecheck for settingsMenu by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1080
  • update emailo deps by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1081
  • segment settings by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1082
  • fix format for curl by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1083
  • add space to not started journey status by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1084
  • register schemas earlier in api build app by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1085
  • address emailo runtime error by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1086
  • memoize codemirror for email editor by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1087
  • focus new template name on open by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1088
  • new resource dialog by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1089
  • new default email message by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1090
  • email templates docs and bug fixes by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1091
  • unsubscribe url docs by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1092
  • fix ordering of emailo build in dev setup by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1094

New Contributors

  • @lyamone made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1056

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.17.0...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • remove unsafe code from stats function by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1097
  • upgrade prisma 5.21.1 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1098
  • upgrade react flow by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1099
  • fix inconsistencies in low code email editor spacing by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1101
  • upgrade typescript by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1100
  • fix emailo css warning by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1107
  • fix css warning in animations.css by @juan-libros in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1103
  • fix draft toggle for low code email by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1106

New Contributors

  • @juan-libros made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1103

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

entry.title: New release for Dittofeed: v0.19.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • update tags to v0.18.1 by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1108
  • emailo readme by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1110
  • emailo: fix image link in README.md by @shenli in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1111
  • deliveries filters by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1112
  • allow raw markup in low code by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1113
  • low code email broadcasts by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1114
  • code in preparation for self onboarding by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1115
  • fill out user delete method by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1116
  • add section on port conflicts by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1117
  • move anchor el to top level of deliveries filter component by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1118
  • more changes in support of self-onboarding by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1119
  • update react flow by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1120
  • add missing font unit in emailo by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1121
  • fix alignment for headers in low code by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1122
  • ensure elements of template modal have to be selected by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1123
  • add explicit react imports by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1124
  • @types/react resolution by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1126
  • add sdk web to lite dockerfile by @maxgurewitz in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1127

New Contributors

  • @shenli made their first contribution in https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/pull/1111

Full Changelog: https://github.com/dittofeed/dittofeed/compare/v0.18.1...v0.19.0
